p.s: Yesterday I found a great article, published on Spiegel Online, about three young people that experienced the life as seamstress for one day in KambodschaCambodia.
It was shocking for them how hard they had to work on working circumstances that are unbelieveableunbelievable.
They realized that these people are only poor because the money is not distribute.
Maybe you will understand more that the globalisation has winners but also losers.
Hopefully we see each other again soon.
